Changes.LogName: Special Order: East Scarp Eloise and Jorts

Entries.Eloise.Jortsseeds.Name: These Seeds Are For The Birds
Entries.Eloise.Jortsseeds.Ordertext: I want to feed the birds so I can birdwatch! Please bring me a bunch of seeds so I can sort through them! You can deliver them to my mailbox. Thank you!^^(There is a muddy pawprint at the bottom of this order)
Entries.Eloise.Jortsseeds.Objective: Deliver 100 mixed seeds for Eloise (and a cat) to her mailbox.

Changes.LogName: Special Order: East Scarp Eloise and Jorts

I wanna see!"/move JortsCat 0 -3 0/move JortsCat -1 0 0 true/positionOffset JortsCat 0 -14 true/faceDirection Eloise 3 false/speak Eloise "No! You can't harm the birds!"/faceDirection JortsCat 1/pause 500/speak JortsCat "Why would I harm friends?$4"/pause 1000/emote Eloise 40/speak Eloise "You have to be really, really quiet, okay?$3"/speak JortsCat "I'm a ninja!$h"/pause 1000/faceDirection Eloise 0/pause 500/faceDirection JortsCat 0/playSound SpringBirds/pause 500/speak JortsCat "So what's that friend's name?"/speak Eloise "That's a cardinal."/speak JortsCat "Hello, cardinal! I've never gotten to be so close before!"/pause 1000/speak JortsCat "What's that one? The red one."/speak Eloise "Oh, that's also a cardinal. A boy one."/speak JortsCat "You can tell they're a boy?$4"/speak Eloise "Yeah, the girl cardinals are brown and the boy cardinals are red.#$b#The boy cardinals have showy colors to attract the girls. Dad says it's called 'sexual dimorphism'."/emote JortsCat 20/speak JortsCat "Wow, that's so neat! So the boys show off for the girls, huh?$h"/speak Eloise "They sure do!$h"/speak JortsCat "Wow, Eloise, you're so smart. I bet you know everything about bird friends!"/speak Eloise "...$3#$b#Hee hee!  Thank you, Jorts!$h"/speak JortsCat "Teach me lots, okay?"/speak Eloise "Sure thing!$h"/pause 1000/playSound SpringBirds/speak JortsCat "So what's that one there?"/speak Eloise "Oh, that's a house sparrow, you can tell by the stripe...."/pause 1000/end
